about.title: OUR HISTORY
about.history: During its 30-year history, DELTA DEFENCE, a.s. Bratislava, in the role of integrator, participated in all transformation projects of Slovakia, after joining NATO (2004).
about.participation: This participation includes projects carried out in cooperation with BAE Systems, such as the IFF project for identifying friend or foe based on communication between a ground radar and a transponder installed in an aircraft or helicopter, or a project for a mobile communication system for the Slovak Army.
about.acquisitions: Through its acquisitions, whether the French manufacturer of automated lines for the production of ammunition Manurhin or the Slovak manufacturer of explosives ISTROCHEM, the company gained access to the technological processes of the production of automated lines and also acquired qualified workers.
about.portfolio: The company's production portfolio consists of:

timeline.1993: Establishment of the Delta-B company "NORICUM GHN-45 project"
timeline.2004: Acquisition of MANURHIN, French ammunition manufacturer with Mulhouse technology
timeline.2005: Cooperation with BAE Systems "IFF - friend-foe identification" for the Slovak Air Force
timeline.2006: Strategic cooperation with Explosia, Pardubice Czech Republic "Medium and small-caliber ammunition powders"
timeline.2011: Cooperation with DIEHL BGT DEFENSE "RM-70/85 MODULAR"
timeline.2013: Acquisition of Istrochem Explosives, Bratislava Development and production of explosives in Slovakia
timeline.2016: Cooperation with BAE SYSTEMS "MOKYS mobile C3 system project" Privatization of the Military Repair Company - VOP Pre≈°ov

production.title: Production
production.ks4Description: KS-4 is an automated, sophisticated system designed for accurate and efficient loading of artillery ammunition and mortar bombs using the auger method. It consists of a system of modules that form the basic elements of the line:

modules.fillingDesc: This module is responsible for filling ammunition with explosive material. It forms a system for loading and preparing cartridges for filling.
modules.millingDesc: This module performs operations to create cavities for the ignition system in filled cartridges. It is closely linked to the filling module, to ensure seamless integration.
modules.dosingDesc: This module ensures accurate dosing of explosive material into cartridges, in close connection with the filling module.
modules.heatingDesc: This module prepares the explosive material to the required temperature for filling. It works closely with the dosing module.
modules.controlDesc: This centralized module controls all machine functions. It includes a computer control system, safety features and control of electrical distribution components.
modules.qualityDesc: Dedicated to the preparation of samples and evaluation of the quality of filling with explosive substances, it includes a system of dividing and control devices.
modules.dustDesc: This module controls the extraction of dust generated during the processes, maintains a clean and safe working environment.
